Description.Name: Kel Snowborn
Description.Details: Kel Snowborn aka "Gunrunner" is an ex bounty hunter from the mercenary group DDI. After a shady deal went bad he was forced into hiding and left the spacer life. Three years later Kel remerged as a MechWarrior running a small operation of mercs. Aggressive and intelligent, Kel seems to have a gift in his ability to adapt quickly to any tactical situation and is a dangerous asset to any Lance.
